childMarkdownRemark.html: Duke University is hosting an academic symposium on podcasting. Join us for the webcast of the session, "iPods in the Classroom" from 12:20 to 1:20 pm followed by a discussion of the topic. Bring your lunch and learn more about how your colleagues have put their iPods to use for teaching.

pageContext.talk_title: Podcasting in the Classroom: A Webcast and Digital Dialogue at MITH
